alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 1:15PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue rising to 15.7 feet Tuesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Illinois River Valley City 14.0 12.3 Wed 8 pm 13.4 14.2 15.0 15.8 16.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
